english.landingText: Chauffeured vehicles for easy transport, rent by hour or day. Tours in Colombia and several other countries; available 24 hours a day in cities such as Bogota, Cartagena, Medellin and their surroundings. Also called Remises, the experience we offer is executed through the latest luxury vehicles y bilingual and professional chauffeurs cetified by 'PAX' the official training partner for the National Limousine Association.
english.servicesTitle1: This is how our service works
english.servicesTitle2: These are the different services we offer

english.faresDayText: Our daily coverage includes 12 hours but you get charged only 8 hours
english.coverageText: We are present with in house operation and local dispatching team in Bogota, Medellin and Cartagena, we cover other Colombian cities from those bases of operation. We can operate in 29 countries with our rigorously selected network of affiliates. When using MetroCar for all your international ground transportation needs you benefit a central point of contact, our 24H dispatch service, and you have the guarantee that our quality process are imposed to every affiliate.
english.contactTitle: use this form to reach out to us directly
english.aboutText1: is a Colombian company founded by two Colombian entrepreneurs with the objective of creating a chauffeured car service with international standards for high executives and luxury tourism. We offer our clients high standard car service, in Colombia and the rest of the world with permanent highlight on service quality constantly anticipating or adapting us to the market requirements. All our processes are established and updated searching for the most innovative, safe, competitive and sustainable solutions.
english.faqTextTitle1: How many hours before a booking can the service be effective?
english.faqText1: Booking must be made at least 24 hours before the desired service time
english.reviewsText1: A great service, arrived on time and very respectful the whole ride. The vehicle was very clean and with good commodities such as water or a guest phone ready to use.
english.footerText: MetroCar is an up and coming Colombian company that dedicates to offer a luxury service to their pasengers, the founders have 10 years of experience in the industry and even though its still growing as a company, that allows us to provide the clients with the attention and care they deserve.
english.footerCredits: This webpage was designed and developed by

spanish.landingText: Vehículos con conductor para traslados, por horas o días, y toures en Colombia y otros 29 países; Disponibles las 24 horas del día en ciudades como Bogotá, Cartagena, Medellín y sus alrededores. También llamados Remises, la experiencia que ofrecemos se ejecuta con vehículos de lujo último modelo y conductores bilingües, profesionales, y certificados por 'PAX' el Official Training Partner de la National Limousine Association.
spanish.servicesTitle1: Un servicio exclusivo, a medida y seguro
spanish.servicesText1: Con experiencia en la industria desde 2017, ofrecemos un servicio de alquiler de vehiculos de alta gama con conductor.
spanish.servicesText2: Todos los integrantes de nuestro equipo se encuentran completamente capacitados para brindar un excelente servicio con puntualidad y cortesia en cada viaje.
spanish.servicesText3: Contamos con una flota de vehiculos de ultima generacion, siguiendo todos los protocolos que garanticen comodidad y seguridad.
spanish.servicesText4: A traves de alianzas y proveedores cuidadosamente seleccionados ofrecemos :
spanish.faresDayText: La cobertura incluye 12 horas de servicio sin embargo el cliente solo paga 8 horas
spanish.coverageText: Somos una empresa con base en Bogota y a traves de afiliados podemos ofrecer servicios en las ciudades de Medellin, Cali, Cartagena,  y Barranquilla.
spanish.contactTitle: usa este formulario para contactar directamente con nosotros
spanish.contactText: Para reservar se puede contactar con esta pagina web, el boton de reserva, o nuestras lineas locales
spanish.aboutText1: Somos una compañia con enfoque en servicio en la que trabajamos dia a dia para mejorar nuestros procesos para que sean seguros y competitivos a las necesidades del mercado

spanish.reviewsText1: un gran servicio, puntal y respetuoso. El vehiculo muy aseado y con comodidades como agua y celular a la disposicion
spanish.footerText: MetroCar es una empresa prometedora Colombiana que se dedica a ofrecer un servico de lujo a sus pasajeros, los fundadores tienen una experiencia de 10 años en la industria y aunque aun es un empresa en crecimiento eso le permite darle la atencion y cuidado a todos sus clientes tal y como lo merecen.
